Package com.barrel

Class Database

java.lang.Object
com.barrel.Database
public class Database extends Object
Database class for handling interactions with the database, including initialization, indexing and searching operations.

  • Constructor Details

    • Database

      Database(String db_id) throws SQLException
      Constructs a Database object with the given database ID. Initializes the database connection and starts the ID counter.
      Parameters:
      db_id - The identifier for the specific database instance.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an SQL error occurs while connecting or creating to the database.

  • Method Details

    • dbConnect

      Connection dbConnect() throws SQLException
      Connects to the database or creates it if it does not exist.
      Returns:
      The connection to the database.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an SQL exception occurs during database connection or creation.

    • getMaxId

      private long getMaxId(Connection conn)
      Retrieves the maximum ID from the messages table in the database.
      Parameters:
      conn - The connection to the database.
      Returns:
      The maximum ID from the messages table.

    • initDB

      private void initDB(Connection conn) throws SQLException
      Initializes the database by creating necessary tables and constraints.
      Parameters:
      conn - The connection to the database.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an SQL exception occurs during the initialization process.

    • createDB

      private Connection createDB() throws SQLException
      Creates a new database if it does not already exist.
      Returns:
      The connection to the newly created database.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an SQL exception occurs during the database creation process.

    • indexUrl

      long indexUrl(String url, org.json.JSONArray words, String title) throws SQLException
      Indexes a URL with the given words and title.
      Parameters:
      url - The URL to index.
      words - The words associated with the URL..
      title - The title of the URL.
      Returns:
      The ID of the indexed URL, or -1 if the URL could not be indexed.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an SQL error occurs while indexing the URL.

    • indexWordLink

      boolean indexWordLink(long wordId, long linkId)
      Indexes a link-word relationship in the database.
      Parameters:
      wordId - The ID of the word to index.
      linkId - The ID of the link to index.
      Returns:
      True if the indexing operation was successful, false otherwise.

    • addLink

      boolean addLink(String url, String url1) throws SQLException
      Adds a link-link relationship to the database.
      Parameters:
      url - The URL of the first link.
      url1 - The URL of the second link.
      Returns:
      True if the addition operation was successful, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an SQL exception occurs during the operation.

    • getUrlId

      long getUrlId(String url) throws SQLException
      Retrieves the ID of a URL from the database.
      Parameters:
      url - The URL to retrieve the ID for.
      Returns:
      The ID of the URL, or -1 if the URL insertion failed.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an SQL exception occurs during the operation.

    • indexedUrl

      boolean indexedUrl(String url)
      Checks if a URL is already indexed in the database.
      Parameters:
      url - The URL to check for indexing status.
      Returns:
      True if the URL is indexed, false otherwise.

    • getWordId

      long getWordId(String word)
      Retrieves the ID of a word from the database. Inserts the word if it doesn't exist.
      Parameters:
      word - The word to retrieve the ID for or insert into the database.
      Returns:
      The ID of the word, or -1 if the insertion failed.

    • search

      Site[] search(String[] words, int page)
      Searches for sites containing all specified words.
      Parameters:
      words - An array of words to search for.
      page - The page number for pagination.
      Returns:
      An array of Site objects matching the search criteria.

    • searchUrl

      Site searchUrl(String url)
      Searches for a specific URL in the database.
      Parameters:
      url - The URL to search for.
      Returns:
      A Site object representing the URL if it is found, or null if the URL is not found.

    • linkedPages

      Site[] linkedPages(String url)
      Retrieves linked pages for a given URL from the database.
      Parameters:
      url - The URL for which linked pages are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      An array of Site objects representing linked pages.

    • insertMessage

      void insertMessage(long id, String message) throws SQLException
      Inserts a message into the database.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the message.
      message - The message content to be inserted.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if an SQL exception occurs during the insertion process.

    • getMessage

      org.json.JSONObject getMessage(long id)
      Retrieves a message from the database based on its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the message to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A JSONObject representing the retrieved message, or null if not found.
